description: Of the many perils Yemen’s civilians have faced during six months of war, none has been as deadly as the airstrikes by a Saudi-led military coalition.
title: Yemen Air Campaign’s Heavy Toll
title_page: Yemen Air Campaign’s Heavy Toll - The New York Times
maintext:
Yemen Air Campaign’s Heavy Toll
Of the many perils Yemen’s civilians have faced during six months of war, none has been as deadly as the airstrikes by a Saudi-led military coalition.
